APP.TITLE: PDF Ease
APP.DESCRIPTION: Merge, split, rotate and preview PDFs quickly
APP.MERGE_DESC: Combine multiple PDFs into one file
APP.SPLIT_DESC: Split a PDF into separate pages or ranges
APP.ROTATE_DESC: Split a PDF into separate pages or ranges
APP.EXTRACT_DESC: Extract pages to a new PDF
APP.OCR_DESC: Convert scanned PDFs to searchable text

HOME.TITLE: All your PDF tools, in one place.
HOME.TAGLINE: Everything you need to work with PDFsâ€”right at your fingertips. Merge, split, compress, convert, rotate, unlock, and watermark files in just a few clicks.

UPLOAD.DRAG_DROP: Drag and drop files to here to upload.
UPLOAD.LOCAL_PROCESSING: All PDF processing happens locally in your browser. Your files are never uploaded, stored, or sent to any server.

SPLIT.MERGE_RANGES: Merge all ranges in one PDF file.
SPLIT.FIXED_RANGE_MESSAGE: Selected pages will be converted into separate PDF files. {{param}} PDF will be created.
SPLIT.PDF_CONVERT_INFO: Selected pages will be converted into separate PDF files. {{param}} PDF will be created.
SPLIT.SELECT_PAGES_MESSAGE: Selected pages will be converted into separate PDF files. {{param}} PDF will be created.
SPLIT.SIZE_MESSAGE: PDF will be split into multiple files, each not exceeding {{param1}}{{param2}}

ROTATE.INSTRUCTION: Mouse over the PDF below and an icon will appear; click the arrows to rotate pages.

Merge.CHANGE_ORDER: To change the order of your PDFs, drag and drop the files as you want.
